header.flutter_widget: Text widget with style which makes it look like a H1.

title.flutter_widget: Text widget with style which makes it look like a H2.

text_field.flutter_widget: TextField widget which reacts on user input

properties.pattern: Regex pattern which can be send as JSON string
properties.label_text: Optional text that describes the input field.
properties.hint_text: Optional text that provides a hint to the user.
properties.error_text: Optional text that provides an error message to the user.

properties.pattern: Regex pattern which can be send as JSON string
